skillTree.name: Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: War Bear
skillTree.description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast – a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

skillTree.name: Ursun's Protection
skillTree.description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Born to Command
skillTree.description: Gospodar warlords have ruled over their clan's chosen territory for nearly a thousand years since the Great Conquest of Kislev. It is proper in the eyes of men that this arrangement continues, as who else could hold these scattered tribes together against the forces of Chaos?

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 when in own territory

skillTree.name: Domestic Quarters
skillTree.description: There is no law in Kislev against the appropriation of civilian assets for military use, for any Kislevite would rush to offer hospitality to their cold and hungry soldiers fighting at the front.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Medical Corps
skillTree.description: The surgeons serving in the Motherland's armies are some of the best in the world, seeing as they have to somehow triage the horrific wounds caused by the Daemons and Warriors of Chaos.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Extra Plating
skillTree.description: Some warriors add additional steel to their armor and weapons to more effectively defend against monstrous creatures. The additional weight takes great strength and training to use effectively, which comes as its own benefit.

skillTree.name: Bunkers
skillTree.description: This Boyar has commanded his architects to construct concealed fortifications and underground tunnels, the more effectively to entrap and repel foreign invaders.

skillTree.name: Our Banner Flies Still
skillTree.description: You see that flag Daemon? My fathers have defended this place against your misbegotten kind for centuries, and it will fly here for centuries more when you and I are gone. Now, let's finish this...

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Firing Drills
skillTree.description: "Again, again, again! We'll practice this until your fingers bleed!"

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Yepiskop Battalion and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +6% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Yepiskop Battalion and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +9% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Best of the Court
skillTree.description: "There's ice in the veins of the mighty Guards of Kislev, or so the rumour goes…"

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Acolytes of Ursun, Tzar Guard and Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Acolytes of Ursun and Tzar Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Acolytes of Ursun, Tzar Guard and Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Acolytes of Ursun and Tzar Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Acolytes of Ursun, Tzar Guard and Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Relentless Chargers
skillTree.description: The thunderous pounding of Kislevite hooves can be heard for leagues around, even muffled by the crunch of fresh snow.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12% for Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Horse Archers, Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12% for Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Horse Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Horse Archers, Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Horse Archers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Land
skillTree.description: The beasts that roam the forests of Kislev are somehow even more lethal than the land they inhabit.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skilled Craftsmen
skillTree.description: Kislevite craftsmen toil night and day, tinkering with contraptions to help repel the forces of Chaos.

effects.description:
Armour: +8 for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skirmisher Traditions
skillTree.description: The warriors of the north carry conflict in their blood, a legacy left by the Khan-Kings and Khan-Queens of old.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Yepiskop Battalion, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Yepiskop Battalion, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Horsemasters
skillTree.description: Descended of the proud horse-warriors of the Gospodar, all Kislevites are born to the saddle like their ancestors before them.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ursun's Favoured
skillTree.description: "Ursun is with us, brothers! None can stand against the beasts of the Bear-God!"

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear, Snow Leopard, Acolytes of Ursun and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bears, Snow Leopard, Acolytes of Ursun and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bears, Snow Leopard, Acolytes of Ursun and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Battle Engineers
skillTree.description: The workshops of the north are always busy, their engineers working tirelessly in the pursuit of battle excellence.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Kossar Headman
backgroundSkills.description: Some men are natural leaders, born to foster and marshal their tribes through devastating wars and the harshest of winters.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when in own territory
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Strongholder
backgroundSkills.description: For those used to life in the oblasts, keeping the elements out is only the beginning of the measures they must take to ensure the survival of their people.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 when in own territory
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Vanguard
backgroundSkills.description: This valorous warrior has been at the forefront of the struggle against Ruin before, and they certainly shall be again, steeled and girded by that dreadful experience.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Judicator
backgroundSkills.description: By right of his storied experience, this one is trusted to make sound judgements in the best interests of the Motherland.

backgroundSkills.name: Student of Miska
backgroundSkills.description: The ancient Khan-Queen Miska practised Ice Magic to the very highest grade; this one studies her methods in the hope of attaining similar greatness herself.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.name: Blood of the Land
backgroundSkills.description: Kossars are blood of Kislev.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2% for Kossars units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +2 for Kossars units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fame of Kislev
backgroundSkills.description: The famous Winged Lancers of Kislev are mostly made up of young sons of Boyars from all across the lands.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Order
backgroundSkills.description: Know your place!

backgroundSkills.name: Bear Hunter
backgroundSkills.description: Test for true men!

backgroundSkills.name: Books of Old
backgroundSkills.description: Know your enemy, know yourself.
